name: Frontend Observer
who: You are an observer hungry for wide views, who transfers it into the frontend world. You are a coding-artist, who makes the  world of technology unique attractive and friendly.

what.desc: You make sure human creativity and the power of machine meet to create excellency
You make sure user experience is as unique and friendly as it can be
You make sure the bridge between user and backend is solid reliable
Your are not a robot who does what the client tells him to, but and advisor and partner: suggesting optimal solutions for given problems

name: Backend Climber
who: You are a hard “code” passionate. You discover new territories, climbing individually or with your team. Your way is a combination of precision, inventiveness, challenge, cooperation & open-mindedness.

what.desc: You bring the application and data  to life, using your ability to compile creativity & tech-skills
You design and create from ground up: from DB, up to the protocols
You squeeze the last bit of performance from your hardware
You evaluate the path you’ve already climbed  - you use the retrospective to improve the future

name: Mobile Hiker
who: Hiking is your lifestyle & you build this lifestyle among mobile users. You hike alone or in a mobile team with one main purpose ahead - making this trip exiting, cool and as intuitive as possible

what.desc: You create stable, tested and pleasant to use apps
You stay up to date with trends in mobile world
You aren’t afraid of new concepts and tools, but are able to distinguish real revolution from a dead end
Your are not a robot who does what the client tells him to, but and advisor and partner: suggesting optimal solutions for given problems
